thread.section_title: The Montcalm London Marble Arch - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing hotel
thread.title_full: Amazing hotel - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: KiranD27
title: Amazing hotel
text: Fantastic 5* hotel with amazing service and facilities. Really glad I stayed here. Highly recommend it. The spa facilities are great too. Just around the corner from Oxford Street -great location. Definitely would suggest getting a club room or higher as the additional perks for doing so really do enhance your stay and your experience
